main event: A witness observed a bright object in the east moving west at high speed in St. Louis, Missouri on May 30, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be drifting off course and included hovering and changes in both speed and direction.
The report mentions that additional information on the hovering and course variations is against the law and difficult to determine.
The document includes a referral notice from the Assistant Chief of Staff of Intelligence, forwarding three UFO reports for appropriate action.
The report mentions a sighting of a reddish-orange object with a constant flashing light, as well as a white aircraft trailing smoke.
The report describes a hovering round ball-shaped object that suddenly appeared to glow and move towards the north direction.
sighted object: bright object, reddish-orange object, round ball-shaped object
